57  struct EXIV2API DataSet {
59  DataSet(
60  uint16_t number,
61  const char* name,
62  const char* title,
63  const char* desc,
64  bool mandatory,
65  bool repeatable,
66  uint32_t minbytes,
67  uint32_t maxbytes,
68  TypeId type,
69  uint16_t recordId,
70  const char* photoshop
71  );
72  uint16_t number_;
73  const char* name_;
74  const char* title_;
75  const char* desc_;
76  bool mandatory_;
77  bool repeatable_;
78  uint32_t minbytes_;
79  uint32_t maxbytes_;
80  TypeId type_;
81  uint16_t recordId_;
82  const char* photoshop_;
83  }; // struct DataSet
